desc.en: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.jp: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.thai: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.ko: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.zh_tw: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获綠的联系后，便去找窝在遊戲開發部的愛麗絲。尽管老师给予了安慰，但愛麗絲依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.en: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.jp: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.thai: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.ko: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 在与愛麗絲的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏萊的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于愛麗絲的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了沙勒的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.thai: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.ko: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.jp: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.thai: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.ko: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子和綠向老师请求协助，愛麗絲一直待在遊戲開發部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子和绿向老师请求协助，爱丽丝一直待在游戏开发部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子和绿向老师请求协助，爱丽丝一直待在游戏开发部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子和绿向老师请求协助，爱丽丝一直待在游戏开发部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.jp: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.thai: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.ko: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。愛麗絲表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.thai: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.ko: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.jp: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.thai: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.ko: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.zh_tw: 就在愛麗絲讲不下去话的时候，莉音突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在爱丽丝讲不下去话的时候，莉央突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.thai: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.ko: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_tw: 击倒AMAS，寧瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后寧瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，綠和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，愛麗絲做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，妮露和时展开了追逐战。但最后妮露却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.thai: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.ko: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉音无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将寧瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉音无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将妮露打倒并压制。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.jp: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.thai: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.ko: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠被压制后，莉音指示AMAS去回收愛麗絲。柚子和綠试图阻止，但遭莉音严厉警告。老师要求莉音住手，莉音反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉音的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠被压制后，莉音指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉音严厉警告。老师要求莉音住手，莉音反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉音的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.jp: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.thai: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.ko: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了愛麗絲的身份。綠试图以工程師部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉音远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。寧瑠在一旁督促愛麗絲不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。愛麗絲会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。尼禄在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程师部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉音远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。宁瑠在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。妮露在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。

desc.en: Aris accepted what Rio said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.jp: Aris accepted what Rio said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.thai: Aris accepted what Rio said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.ko: Aris accepted what Rio said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲接受了莉音的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。愛麗絲表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Not until Rio's left could anyone even move a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.jp: Not until Rio's left could anyone even move a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.thai: Not until Rio's left could anyone even move a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.ko: Not until Rio's left could anyone even move a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.zh_tw: 直到莉音走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。愛麗絲，就此不见。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。
